items.sentence: When did you notice that your purse was missing?
What do your children usually eat for breakfast?
Tom forgot to water the plants for a whole week.
Tom got an emergency call and had to leave work.
Tom had his chauffeur drive Mary to the airport.
Tom has a lot of people to see tomorrow morning.
You ought to let Tom know that you can\'t drive.
You really don\'t believe what Tom said, do you?
You really should\'ve been a little more polite.
Tom has been battling depression for many years.
I can\'t afford to eat at expensive restaurants.
I can\'t believe Tom never told Mary about John.
I can\'t explain the situation better than that.
The situation called for quick, decisive action.
The situation was really difficult to deal with.
I just wish I\'d never gotten involved with you.
I know that I can\'t do that as well as you can.
You should\'ve let me drive you home last night.
I couldn\'t help but admire Tom\'s perseverance.
Do you want me to explain to you how that works?
